job_tasks.phrase: assist our customers in their Databricks journey and provide them with the guidance and expertise that they need to accomplish value and achieve their strategic goals using our products
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on understanding customer business goals and guiding them to achieve value using the company's products.

job_tasks.phrase: provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions developed by Databricks customers
job_tasks.justification: Offering guidance on best practices implies understanding customer solutions and aligning them with strategic goals for optimal value.

job_tasks.phrase: resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform
job_tasks.justification: The Databricks platform is a unified analytics platform that encompasses data engineering and data science capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: address customer issues related to Spark core internals, Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, Delta, Lakehouse and other Databricks runtime features
job_tasks.justification: These are all components of data engineering and data processing pipelines within the Databricks ecosystem.

job_tasks.phrase: setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions in the areas of Spark SQL, Delta, Memory Management, Performance tuning, Streaming, Data Science and Data Integration areas in Spark
job_tasks.justification: This involves configuring and troubleshooting data processing and integration aspects of Spark, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform
job_tasks.justification: The Databricks platform includes ML/AI capabilities, so resolving platform challenges can encompass modeling aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: address customer issues related to ... Data Science
job_tasks.justification: Data Science is a broad term that includes model development and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues by our customers
job_tasks.justification: This involves providing technical solutions, which is akin to software development and debugging for a platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark
job_tasks.justification: Deep code-level analysis and troubleshooting are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues and best practices guidelines
job_tasks.justification: This involves collaboration with other technical and client-facing roles, a common aspect of software development project execution.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams to help report Product defects
job_tasks.justification: Reporting product defects and coordinating with engineering teams is a software development lifecycle activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Help create company documentation and knowledge articles
job_tasks.justification: Creating documentation and knowledge articles is a supporting activity for software development and product usage.

job_tasks.phrase: resolve any challenges involving the Databricks unified analytics platform
job_tasks.justification: Troubleshooting and resolving issues on a platform can involve operational aspects of maintaining it.

job_tasks.phrase: address customer issues related to ... Performance tuning
job_tasks.justification: Performance tuning is an operational aspect of ensuring systems run efficiently.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in weekend (infrequent) and weekday (normal business hrs) on-call rotation
job_tasks.justification: On-call rotation is a direct responsibility related to operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with Account Executives, Solutions Architects and Professional Services for coordinating customer issues and best practices guidelines
Coordinate with Engineering and Backline Support teams
provide technical and consulting related solutions for the challenging Spark/ML/AI/Delta/Streaming/Lakehouse reported issues by our customers
Troubleshoot, resolve and suggest deep code-level analysis of Spark to address customer issues
Assist the customers in setting up reproducible Spark problems with solutions
provide best practices guidance for custom-built solutions

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on technical support and troubleshooting for the Databricks platform, particularly concerning Spark, data engineering, and data science. While it mentions AI and ML, the core responsibilities are not about developing or fine-tuning generative models but rather supporting users of existing data and AI tools.
